overview: "MN" stands for Marissa Navarro, a character played onscreen by screen legend Carmen Rosales. It tells of a story of Marissa, a strict, heartless, domineering and fiery heiress and daughter of a wealthy landowner, who instills and sows fear among its populace.
tagline: What is the story behind these two letters? Is it LOVE?...HATERD?...GREED?...INTRIGUE?...DEVOTION?
title: MN
